cetus.hir

Class ReturnStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.hir.Statement
      • cetus.hir.ReturnStatement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotatable, Printable, Traversable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ReturnStatement
extends Statement
    Represents a return statement within a procedure.
